org.apache.kafka.common

Interface Metric


  • public interface Metric
    A metric tracked for monitoring purposes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MetricName metricName()
      A name for this metric
      java.lang.Object metricValue()
      The value of the metric, which may be measurable or a non-measurable gauge
      double value()
      Deprecated. 
      As of 1.0.0, use metricValue() instead. This will be removed in a future major release.

    • Method Detail

      • metricName

        MetricName metricName()
        A name for this metric

      • value

        @Deprecated
double value()
        Deprecated. As of 1.0.0, use metricValue() instead. This will be removed in a future major release.
        The value of the metric as double if the metric is measurable and `0.0` otherwise.

      • metricValue

        java.lang.Object metricValue()
        The value of the metric, which may be measurable or a non-measurable gauge
